## MakeRequired type

Makes specified keys of an interface Required while the rest remain unchanged.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MakeRequired<GType extends {}, GKeys extends Key<GType>> = Omit<GType, GKeys> & {
    [P in GKeys]-?: GType[P];
};
```
